content: the rosewood cardigan is a relaxed long and slouchy cardigan that you can wear every single day this wardrobe staple is made with lightweight cotton/bamboo yarn that drapes beautifully this cardigan has cozy pockets and a gorgeous collar and is perfect for beginners since it uses the simple single_crochet check out the blog post for more information on sizing and yardage the step-by-step blog post can be found **here** 2 the knit version of this design using called the **uptown cardigan** using the same coboo yarn can be found ** here 3 ** join the **crochet-along** through our facebook group **here** 4 1 https //www etsy com/ca/listing/726248768/rosewood-cardigan-crochet-pattern 2 https //www allaboutami com/rosewood-cardigan/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-the-uptown-cardigan/ 4 https //www facebook com/groups/918093418570667
